snippet.title: Drink company has a sweet spot in our history
snippet.content: THE Wimmers soft drink name had been around for more than half a century when the Sunshine Coast was named in 1967. Both it and Cooroy Mountain Spring Water came up as a business opportunity five years ago when both operations went into receivership during the GFC. We had no experience in the beverage game but knew we wanted to keep these iconic Queensland businesses alive and running in their home town of Cooroy. After the dust had settled, we amalgamated the businesses to create Noosa Beverages, which manufactures well-established brands Wimmers Premium Softdrinks, Cafe Earth, Noosa Natural Spring Water and Cooroy Mountain Spring Water. With financial backing, good basic business management and significant commitment from our hard-working staff, we quickly turned both businesses back to being profitable. With customers again demanding our products, we could see ourselves outgrowing the small manufacturing facility and so took the opportunity to purchase the old CSR brickworks site on Lake Macdonald Dr at Cooroy. Major construction works took place over two years to develop the site into the massive 9000sqm building that is now home to our for best practice beverage manufacturing, warehousing, distribution and administration. Using as many remaining materials as possible from the old brickworks plant, we carefully ensured the link to this long-time Cooroy factory was kept alive. The original old bricks feature prominently in our new foyer. The facility has enough room for four bottling lines plus additional storage and has an expansive office space, while the land area can accommodate another 6000sqm building when required. A brand new carbonated bottling line purchased from America to advance and broaden our beverage opportunities has both PET and glass capabilities. This line has diversified our potential product range and increased significantly the speed at which we can bottle. It gives us the opportunity to have our natural spring water used in our traditional Wimmers soft drinks and low sugar Cafe Earth flavored mineral waters as well as producing our own sparkling mineral water, which we are developing at present on request from a major grocer. Not only have we made improvements to the carbonated side of the business but we also installed modern infrastructure at our Natural Spring Water site at the base of Cooroy Mountain, with an upgrade of high-flow water supply that can pump out 50 litres of our high quality natural spring water every second. The future is now endless for Noosa Beverages as we have positioned the company to competitively explore opportunities for new beverage products with both natural spring water and carbonated components. This has seen us maintain our long-time customers and attract new ones including overseas buyers who place a high value on quality and credible products of regional manufacturers like us.
